Sun.name: Sun
Sun.diameter: 1,391,000 km (109 times the diameter of Earth)
Sun.rotationPeriod: About 25 days at the equator (Earth size)
Sun.revolutionPeriod: Does not orbit around another object

Mercury.name: Mercury
Mercury.diameter: 4,878 km (equivalent to 0.38 times the diameter of Earth)
Mercury.surfaceTemperature: -170 degrees C at night and 430 degrees C during the day

Venus.name: Venus
Venus.diameter: 12,103 km (equivalent to 0.95 times the diameter of Earth)
Venus.atmosphereComposition: 80 km thick layer consisting of carbon dioxide with some water vapor. Clouds contain droplets of concentrated sulfuric acid

Earth.name: Earth
Earth.atmosphereComposition: 78% nitrogen, 21% oxygen, 1% carbon dioxide, argon, and water vapor, as well as other gases

Mars.name: Mars
Mars.diameter: 6,794 km (equivalent to 0.53 times the diameter of Earth)
Mars.atmosphereComposition: A very thin layer consisting mostly of carbon dioxide
Mars.surfaceTemperature: Range -120 degrees C to 25 degrees C

Jupyter.name: Jupyter
Jupyter.diameter: 142,984 km (equivalent to 11.21 times the diameter of Earth)

Saturn.name: Saturn
Saturn.diameter: 120,536 km (equivalent to 9.45 times the diameter of Earth)
Saturn.atmosphereComposition: A very thick layer consisting of hydrogen and helium

Uranus.name: Uranus
Uranus.diameter: 51,200 km (equivalent to 4.01 times the diameter of Earth)
Uranus.atmosphereComposition: Hydrogen, helium, and very turbulent, wind speed of more than 600 km/hour

Neptune.name: Neptune
Neptune.diameter: 49,528 km (equivalent to 3.88 times the diameter of Earth)
Neptune.atmosphereComposition: Hydrogen, helium, wind speed more than 600 km/hour
